subject: Football
Television
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The network could have taken the spirit of 1967 and relived the first Super Bowl without 21st-century excess, but it adopted the ethic of the multi-hour Super Bowl pregame show.
snippet: The network could have taken the spirit of 1967 and relived the first Super Bowl without 21st-century excess, but it adopted the ethic of the multi-hour Super Bowl pregame show.
